title: What hormone balance means
summary: Balance is about patterns and symptoms, not one number.
body: Hormones work as a system. A clinician interprets labs with your history and goals in mind.

title: Preparing for a hormone consult
summary: Bring symptom timelines and lifestyle context.
body: Sleep, energy, mood, and cycle patterns help a provider interpret results responsibly.

title: Common hormone myths
summary: Symptoms often overlap, which is why simplistic answers fail.
body: The goal is to avoid one-size-fits-all fixes and focus on careful, personalized care.
